name: Qdoba.com
description: Full online ordering experience backed by NCR Aloha. Qdoba.com was built using React, Redux, Typescript, and Webpack.

name: PinYada
description: Make someone's day with PinYada, the free messaging app that is all about making someone's day and having your day made. It's super easy to pin a Yada! Choose whose day you want to make, create your day-making message and pin it to the perfect time or place. The smallest moments can have the biggest impact so when you're inspired to make someone's day, PinYada!
